Description:
Family Flexibility with Mt. Ridley Prestige
Occupying an exceptionally wide allotment (640m2 approx) in a peaceful no through road in Mt Ridley & surrounded by beautifully presented homes & gardens, this distinctive double-storey 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home assures a fine family lifestyle with its indoor versatility & impressive outdoor space.
Offering 4 big bedrooms, luxurious ensuite with spa & double shower, separate study or potential 5th bedroom, generous formal lounge & dining, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals, large family room, an additional rumpus/games room upstairs & double remote garage with internal access & drive through to the rear yard to a colossal pergola area.
Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, CCTV cameras, garden shed, family-sized laundry, beautifully landscaped gardens & much much more.
Positioned in the prestigious Mt Ridley Estate, it's within walking distance to all surrounding amenities including shops, Hume Anglican Grammar, cafes, public transport, parkland & very easy access to Hume Fwy and a short drive to Craigieburn central shopping centre & train station.
With a real emphasis on space & room to grow, why would you consider building when all the space you could ever need is on offer here.
Insights: 8 Strathallan Grove, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character to all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 3 bedrooms, master with walk in robe & two-way ensuite, fully equipped kitchen with brand-new stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher & ample cupboard space, large open plan meals area with adjoining family room. Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight, surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating, split system heating & cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens, new carpet, new blinds, single garage with drive though access & internal access & large laundry with plenty of cupboard space. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Aitken Creek Primary School, Craigieburn Central, age care facilities, public transport & childcare facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
The Hunt Is Over
Engulfed in natural light and set in an established neighbourhood with every Highlands advantage, this stylish and modern residence is a must-see for growing families with its flexible floorplan, quality features & terrific living/entertaining zones.
Blissfully quiet yet enviably conveniently located within walking distance to Malcolm Creek trails & parkland, close to Highlands Shopping Centre & public transport as well as popular schools including Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar. All on a generous allotment of 472 SQM.
Property highlights include:
• 3 bedrooms BIR
• Master with WIR and Ensuite
• Formal lounge
• Open meals/living
• Central kitchen with s/s appliances
• Walk in pantry
• Double lock up garage with internal access
• New timber decking flowing into the spacious backyard
• Freshly painted
• Surrounded by manicured gardens
• Newly carpeted
• Raised doors throughout
• Colourbond fencing around
• Central bathroom
• Plenty of storage
• Ducted heating
• Split system cooling
• High ceilings
• Solar panels

Description:
Ex-Display Excellence
Impressive dimensions, beautifully designed interiors and high quality specifications define this masterfully crafted as-new, ex-display residence.
Luxuriously appointed throughout, immaculate interiors include an impressive kitchen boasting stone benches and mirrored splashback, walk-in pantry and expansive living and dining spaces, rumpus/games room opening to a generous alfresco zone providing endless opportunities for outdoor dining and entertaining. Four bedrooms each feature fitted walk-in-robes whilst main boasts sophisticated his/hers en suite and a separate children's retreat/study offers the flexibility of a third living zone.
Also with home office/study, family bathroom, fitted laundry, heating/cooling, security alarm system, and double garage with internal access. Sited opposite a picture-perfect park, this home must simply be inspected in order to be fully appreciated.
Internal area
261.17m²

Description:
Beautiful Family 4 Bedroom home with Theatre
The Phone Code for this property is: 38544. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
You will not be disappointed.
Freshly painted 29.29 Sqs of living space this secure home is in a much sort after location.
Close to schools, shops, Cragieburn Central shopping centre and transport.
SOLAR
Fitted with Solar Panels as well as Solar Hot Water System
LIVING AREAS
Open plan living with Lounge (fitted with Surround Sound System) large Kitchen Butlers Pantry and Stone Bench Tops fitted with Stainless 900mm Cooker, Dishwasher and built in Microwave.
Dining area & Piazza both featuring beautifly detailed water fountains, Sliding doors fully opening onto the Piazza decking.
The Home offers a neat backyard with paving and BBQ area.
THEATRE
Why not catch the latest movies in your very own theatre room with stunning surround sound and theatre style seating.
BEDROOMS
Master Bedroom with Retreat, full Ensuite, Double Shower and magnificent Spa Bath & Walk in Robe.
Bedroom 2 with Walk in Robe.
Bedrooms 3 & 4 with Built in Mirrored Robes
Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling makes the home perfectly comfortable in both summer and winter.
GARAGE
Double Garage with remote control door, internal access as well as access to back yard.
Large Laundry with lots of storage.
Alarm system.
VIEW BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.

Description:
BEST FAMILY HOME !
A beautiful Brand New 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn is under construction. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Highlands Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set in a beautiful street with the friendliest of neighbours is this much loved and cared for home.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with BIR's). When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area with a great sized kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position, only minutes from Craigieburn Central and beautiful parklands.
This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers
Features:
Downlights in the living area
Evaporative Cooling
Ducted Heating
40mm stone bench top in kitchen
900 stainless steel appliances
Coloured concrete driveway
Photos For Illustrative Purposes Only

Description:
TICKING ALL THE BOXES FOR 1ST HOME BUYERS AND INVESTORS!
If you're looking for that perfect 1st home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go...Offering a blend of low maintenance living without compromising on space or comfort. This well-presented home is sure to impress!
There are 2 large bedrooms both with built in robes, kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking meals & living area, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling, LED lights, undercover alfresco, low maintenance front and rear yards, double remote garage with drive through and internal access.
Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn close to public transport, schools, parklands, Craigieburn Central, splash aquatic centre, medical centre and library!
Don't let this opportunity pass you by, call us today!

Description:
Family Perfection in a Prime Location!
Located in one of the most sought after pocket in Craigieburn and situated within close proximity to all amenities. This magnificent single storey home comprises separate entrance with high ceiling running throughout, 2 separate living zones including formal lounge, large kitchen that overlooks meals & a huge family area with access to a beautiful outdoor entertaining area, 5 great size bedrooms (master with full ensuite & WIR and all with BIR's), central bathroom, separate toilet, spacious laundry, and side driveway leading to a double garage (with remote control and internal access).
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2.7 high ceiling throughout, kitchen appliances, dishwasher, blinds, alarm system and much more.

Description:
Affordable Living..Great Location..Magnificent views
A modern-living townhouse with magnificent views, this 3-bedroom home is positioned in a top location in Craigieburn adjoining Highlands Lake Playground.
Perfect for families, those looking to enter the market or investors alike, you're close to local shopping centres, cafes, restaurants, the library, the leisure centre, and reputable schools.
Complete with a large open floor plan, the flexible living, dining and kitchen zones offer a sizeable area to entertain family and friends. Put your culinary skills to the test in the spacious kitchen boasting Westinghouse stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, ample benchtop room, and cabinetry.
Upstairs, all 3 bedrooms are tucked away and come with handy built-in robes. The main bathroom is in a central location for easy access, and the master includes an additional private ensuite for the ultimate convenience.
For added security, the double European-style garage with access from the backyard.
With everything you need and so much more, this property offers a great return on investment for savvy investors.
Features:
- 3 Bedrooms with Built-in Robes
- 2 Bathrooms / 3 Toilets
- Open Living Plan, Kitchen and Dining
- Westinghouse Stainless Steel Appliances
- Reverse Cycle Split-system (Heating & Cooling)
- European-style double Garage
For more information please contact Albert Edward on 0490 048 017

Description:
Excellence, Quality & Luxury
A timeless blend of luxury living and memorable entertaining, this super-stylish yet immensely practical family home within an exclusive cul-de-sac will entice and impress.
Opposite to parklands providing easy access and a pretty walk to the school, local shops, bus stops and everything great Craigieburn has to offer.
Every clever element of this owner-built home leaves a lasting impression! The ground floor introduces a guest bedroom complete with built in robes, theatre room and an expansive open plan kitchen/living/meals area. Wrapping around a high-end kitchen boasting stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances, a walk in pantry which all allows for a seamless transition to a private alfresco, and a low maintenance rear yard to enjoy with family and friends.
A journey up the luxurious staircase leads you to a generous size family retreat with a balcony that over-looks beautiful park lands and city views- something you definitely dont want to miss!
Venture through to a spacious master bedroom that includes a walk in robe, and a luxurious ensuite fitted with a double basin and Jet Spa.
Remaining bedrooms all generous in size, include built in robes and are serviced through a central bathroom. Above the garage you are given access to a spacious separate studio apartment comprising of a bedroom, kitchenette and separate bathroom.
Other luxurious fixtures include: real timber floors, grade ducted heating, evaporative cooling, floor to ceiling tiles to bathrooms, alarm, cctv camera surveillance, double garage and separate drive through gate. Nothing has been left to chance to ensure fabulous family living.

Relax, Entertain & Enjoy

A well-equipped kitchen features ample cupboard space and dishwasher, adjoining meals and living area, which flows seamlessly through to the oversized outdoor entertaining area where you will find a huge covered pergola and a large backyard with plenty of space for the kids to play. Description:
The Perfecter Starter!!
If you are looking to get your foot into the property market, keen on adding to the investment portfolio or aiming to downsize, then this property will tick all the boxes. Situated in the always popular Highlands estate, in close proximately to beautiful parklands, Newbury Primary and other local schools plus childcare facilities, public transport, the highlands shopping centre and more, this home surely will impress. The home itself Comprises of good size master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite including oversized shower, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, open plan living and meals area as well a large alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain. Other features including ducted heating, 2 split system cooling units, single lock up garage with remote control, low maintenance front and back gardens and much more.. An inspection is a must and surely will not disappoint.
Insights: 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Welcome to Craigieburn!
If you are looking to buy an easy-living in a great location, this contemporary single-level home delivers a value-packed lifestyle first home or investment/opportunity with its light-filled interior & quality features along with easy access to the best of Craigieburn.
Presented beautifully, this home boasts a free-flowing design highlighting an open plan living zone with a great size dining zone with a spacious kitchen with stone top kitchen and s/s appliances which leads out to your alfresco for all your party needs and a manicured yard for the kids and pets.
Also up on offer we have 3 double bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & private ensuite) & main central bathroom.
Extras include: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling split system, ceiling fans, dishwasher, alarm system, double lock up remote garage with internal access and all this within close proximity to trails & parkland, it also offers easy access to primary &
secondary schools, kinder/childcare services, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & the new aquatic centre.
Land: 313 m2
Settlement: 30, 45 OR 60 days
Insights: 87 Thoresby Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Tri-Level Innovation With Size, Quality And Location
Entry-level excellence or investment perfection, this modern tri-level townhouse is a winning choice either way with its cleverly-designed interior, quality features throughout and idyllic position with the best of Craigieburn at your fingertips. Bathed in natural light, the home's impeccably presented interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with BIRs) and dedicated study/home office, stylish central bathroom with stone-top vanity and second WC.
Added to this is a sunny lounge leading through to the kitchen/dining area complete with stone benches, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights of the home include split-system heating and cooling, efficient LED lighting, full-size laundry and high ceilings throughout, plus the added advantage of two north-facing terraces (from the master bedroom and lounge) and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Windrock Avenue buses, Splash Leisure Centre, local parks and recreational facilities, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a choice of popular primary and secondary schools. Outstanding modern living!
Insights: 20/1-27 Punt Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Family Expanse on 733m2
In a blissfully quiet cul-de-sac & spread out on a whopping 733m2, this two-storey home presents an exceptional indoor/outdoor family lifestyle opportunity with its versatile design, 6 car accommodation, quality inclusions & immaculate presentation throughout.
Surrounded by established gardens, the home's pristine interior comprises 5 main bedrooms, 1 conveniently placed downstairs (large master upstairs with his/hers robes & private ensuite), updated stylish family bathrooms & guest powder room (3rd WC). Multiple living zones include an elegant formal lounge & adjoining dining area, large rumpus (upstairs) with leafy outlook & open-plan family/meals area accompanied by a well-appointed stone top kitchen with quality appliances & an abundance of cupboard space.
Add to this ducted heating & evaporative cooling, 8x solar panels, tinted windows, large family-sized laundry & under-stair storeroom. Step outside to a wide backyard garden & peaceful surrounds, where your kids can play until their heart's content in complete privacy, it also boasts a fabulous decked & fully enclosable undercover entertaining area with clear PVC cafe blinds to satisfy the all seasons entertainer.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, local shops, primary & secondary schools, local parks & Aitken Creek trails, it's close to childcare centres & kindergartens, Craigieburn Station as well as easy freeway access. A truly outstanding family lifestyle opportunity awaits the lucky family!
Insights: 3 Ilford Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
